name: Galaxystrife
description:
Galaxystrife is an online multiplayer shooter situated in space. Inspired by many space shooters, Galaxystrife offers engaging battles and fast-paced action. Maneuver your space ship among flying bullets, shrapnels and explosions. Dodge projectiles while spewing charges of your own. Pick up weapons, special abilities or energy orbs of fallen enemies.

Controls are very simple. Just use the mouse to move. Press left mouse button to shoot, right mouse button to use special ability. The ship will follow the cursor. Put cursor inside the circle around your ship to move slower and make sharper turns.
